title: Why Does the NYPD Need Secret X-Ray Vans?
text:
Why Does the NYPD Need Secret X-Ray Vans? 
Published By: Gawker.com - Today 
The New York Post reports that the NYCLU has requested to file an amicus brief in support of a lawsuit filed by the website ProPublica again...
